statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_usage.input_tokens // 0'); limit=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_usage.limit // 0'); if [ "$limit" -gt 0 ]; then pct=$((current * 100 / limit)); else pct=0; fi; filled=$((pct * 20 / 100)); empty=$((20 - filled)); bar="["; for ((i=0; i<filled; i++)); do bar+="█"; done; for ((i=0; i<empty; i++)); do bar+="░"; done; bar+="]"; printf "%s | %s %d%%" "$model" "$bar" "$pct"
